title: Can I write on Medium for free? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. There are two different things you need to understand, the terminologies used on Medium. Medium Partner program: Medium partner program is for writers who want to make money from their articles by publishing Member only articles. Medium pay those writers based on a metric called “Reading time” The number is still unknown of how much they pay per minute member read the time. So, if you are a writer, then all you need to do is to join the Medium partner program and start writing about things you love.Medium Membership. If you want to be a reader on Medium, then you have to pay $5/Month or $50/year to read unlimited member-only articles on Medium. The portion of your $5 will goes to writers who you read articles of. Medium works as a third-party between you(Member) and writer. You could also join the Medium partner program if you want to make money and read articles at the same time.I hope this will helps you. You can follow me on Medium here; Aamir Kamal 🚀🚀🚀 – Medium

Yes. I have a Medium account and I paid nothing. Just sign up for a Medium account then upload your article(s). Just make sure they are good. If you want to enjoy special reader/writer facilities on Medium then you can subscribe to premium Medium which attracts a small fee. If you are not interested in premium Medium you can continue publishing articles with your free Medium account. The amount of articles you can read a month may be “restricted” on the free Medium account but my experience shows the restriction isn't strictly enforced.

Yes.. By creating your free account, you can follow your favorite authors and publications, interact with their stories, bookmark them for later, publish your own posts, and more. Become a Medium member Additionally, for $5/month or $50/year, you can become a Medium member to get unlimited access to all the best stories on Medium and more. Medium membership gives you: unlimited, ad-free access to all the stories on Mediumour monthly magazine, exclusive columnists, and themed collectionsthousands of audio versions of popular storiescurated daily selections from leading publishers and magazinesMembership subscription is an optional subscription that is not required in order to read and write. You can learn more about becoming a Medium member in this article.

Yes. Anyone can sign up and write on Medium for free. The only thing you can and should pay for is reading the stories in there which only costs $5 per month for unlimited reading. Without paying the monthly fee of only $5, you only get to read 3 stories in there per month. The $5 per month is worth it. However, when signing up to write it is totally free. Just make sure to sign up for the Medium Partner Program to earn money and put your articles you write behind the paywall to be able to earn from them.

Yes you can!! Writing is totally free. But if you want to read more than 3 articles a month, then you have to pay $5 a month for a membership. Also! You get these things called “friend links” that you can share with your audience and they can read your work regardless of if they have read all their free articles.
Yes, you can. You don’t have to get the membership to write. But if you want to earn money, then you have to get the membership.
Yes! You can either write on it like a blog for free or you can create your own publication on their for free.

Is medium free for writers? The term “medium” in this case is singular for “media”, so the question would be more grammatical as “Is any medium free for writers?”. Yes, many blogs and similar internet-based platforms are free for writers.
